[[Category:Quests]]
[[image:ringforgiveness.png|thumb|300px|Ring of Forgiveness]]
__TOC__
==Description==
The Ring of Forgiveness is a [[Blessed]] item allows you and your pets to be automatically teleported to a [[Healer]] while dead to a healer once every 12 hours. 

==How to Use==
To activate the ring's ability, you must be currently dead and must type:

'''I seek forgiveness'''

This will teleport you and your pets to the [[Britain|West Britain Healer]] if you are considered an [[Flagging#Red|Innocent]], meaning there are not enough [[Player_Killing|Player Murder counts]] to permanently label you as a [[Flagging#Red|Murderer]].

Otherwise, you will be sent to the [[Buccaneer%27s_Den|Buccaneer's Den Healer]] if you are considered a [[Flagging#Red|Murderer]].

==How to Obtain==
* This item is given as a reward for completing the [[Vengeance]] quest in the [[Young Player Dungeon]].
* This item can be purchased from the [[Unique_Wares_Vendor|Unique Wares Vendor also known as Gold Sink Vendors]].

==Notes==
* Only usable once per character every 12 hours, multiple rings will NOT allow you to activate the ability more than one time.
* These rings are bound to your character, make sure if you are buying a ring from the [[Unique_Wares_Vendor|Unique Wares Vendor]], that you purchase the ring with the character you wish to use the ring.
* Pets will not be teleported with you if they are currently still in combat. In the event of your demise, it might be a good idea to wait until the combat is over to allow them to come with you on this journey!
